FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: What globally unique, persistent, resolvable identifiers do you use for metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Expect DOI URL for landing/metadata record.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: What globally unique, persistent, resolvable identifiers do you use for datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Expect DOI URL for dataset.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which metadata schemas do you use for findability?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Accepted: DataCite schema, schema.org Dataset.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: What is the technology that links the persistent identifiers of your data to the metadata description?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Repository PID system must include DOI.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: In which search engines are your metadata records indexed?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Resolvable index/search endpoints.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: In which search engines are your datasets indexed?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Expect DataCite Search index.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which standardized communication protocol do you use for metadata records?
Which standardized communication protocol do you use for datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Require HTTPS endpoints.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which authentication & authorisation technique do you use for metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: DCS has no dedicated AAI field; using distribution.data_access as proxy.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which authentication & authorisation technique do you use for datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Proxy via distribution-level access label.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which metadata longevity plan do you use?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Evaluated narratively outside core DCS; repository policies, DataCite retention.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which knowledge representation languages (allowing machine interoperation) do you use for metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: KR languages typically declared outside core DCS (tool-specific).

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which knowledge representation languages (allowing machine interoperation) do you use for datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Dataset encodings are not a first-class DCS field.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which structured vocabularies do you use to annotate your metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: We encode vocabularies via identifier URLs in metadata_standard_id.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which structured vocabularies do you use to encode your datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Same proxy as I2-MD.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which models, schema(s) do you use for your metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Type is expected to be 'url' for URL-identified schemas.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which models, schema(s) do you use for your datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Type is expected to be 'url' for URL-identified schemas.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which usage license do you use for your metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Prefer CC0; CC BY acceptable.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which usage license do you use for your datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Dataset should be CC BY 4.0.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which metadata schemas do you use for describing the provenance of your metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Provenance schemas usually documented in narrative or external specs.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which metadata schemas do you use for describing the provenance of your datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: As above; not directly expressible via core DCS fields.
